pp.title: Privacy Policy | Terms and Conditions
pp.description: All product names, logos and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used on this website are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, logos and brands does not imply any endorsement or endorsement of them.

nav.start: To place an order or get in touch with our sales team, you can contact us through the Contact Us section.

hero.title: Melorin: Your Launchpad to the World of Online Business
hero.description: At Melorin, we combine creativity and technology to build websites that not only meet your current needs but also secure the future of your business. From advanced online stores to unique, specialized websites, our team is here to bring every idea to life. Experience unparalleled digital growth with us.

pricing.summary: ما رؤیاهای دیجیتال شما را به واقعیت تبدیل می‌کنیم.
pricing.description: در این بخش می‌توانید نگاهی به پروژه‌های ما بیندازید و با تخصص، خلاقیت، و کیفیت کار ما بیشتر آشنا شوید. ما با هر پروژه‌ای تلاش می‌کنیم بهترین راه‌حل‌ها را برای نیازهای مشتریان ارائه دهیم.
